member.name: ANIMATIONINFO
member.summary: Describes the animation effects associated with user actions. This structure is used with the function when the SPI_GETANIMATION or SPI_SETANIMATION action value is specified.

member.name: ANIMATIONINFO.cbSize
member.summary: The size of the structure, in bytes. The caller must set this to sizeof(ANIMATIONINFO).

member.name: ANIMATIONINFO.iMinAnimate
member.summary: If this member is nonzero, minimize and restore animation is enabled; otherwise it is disabled.
